name: stock-moves-explained
description: Explains why US stocks moved today. Get AI-powered analysis when you ask 'why did Tesla drop?', 'what's going on with NVDA?', 'why is Apple down?', or 'what happened to Google stock?'. Covers S&P 500, NASDAQ 100, and Dow 30 (~550 stocks). Identifies news catalysts and flags mystery moves with no obvious reason. Not for price quotes or trading advice.

tools.name: explain_stock_move
tools.description: Get AI-powered analysis explaining why a US stock moved today. Covers S&P 500, NASDAQ 100, and Dow 30 stocks.

ticker.description: Stock ticker symbol (e.g., 'TSLA') or company name (e.g., 'Tesla', 'Google'). Supports common aliases like 'Facebook' for META.
